sense.def:
Stvar, oseba, dogodek ali obdobje, ki je
the first
, je zgodnejši kot vsi drugi iste vrste.

To do something first
pomeni nekaj storiti prej kot vsi drugi ali preden storimo vse drugo.

seg.quote: First I went to see the editor of the Dispatch.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj zgodi ali je storjeno
for the first time
, se ni zgodilo ali bilo storjeno še nikoli prej.

seg.quote: For the first time in our lives something really exciting has happened.
Vita and Harold first met in the summer of 1910.

sense.def:
Kadar je neki dogodek
a first
, se ni še nikdar prej zgodil.

seg.quote: It's a first for me too.

sense.def:
Stvar, oseba ali kraj, ki je v neki vrsti
the first
, je najbližji prednjemu delu ali najbližji nam.

seg.quote: They took their seats in the first three rows.

sense.def:
The first you hear of or know about something
je prvič, ko nekaj slišimo ali za nekaj izvemo.

seg.quote: The first Mr Walker knew about it was when he saw it in the local paper.

sense.def:
Izraz
at first
uporabimo, če govorimo o tistem, kar se zgodi v začetnem delu nekega dogodka ali doživetja v nasprotju s tistim, kar sledi pozneje.

Besedo
first
uporabimo, kadar nameravamo omeniti prvo stvar v vrsti.

seg.quote: There were several reasons for this. First, four submarines had been sighted.

sense.def:
First
se nanaša na najboljšo ali najpomembnejšo stvar ali osebo določene vrste.

seg.quote: The first duty of the state is to ensure that law and order prevail.

sense.def:
To put someone or something first
pomeni z nekom ravnati tako, kot da je pomembnejši od vsega drugega.

seg.quote: Your family must always come first.
